title: Fs: Ames miscut(next card showing) & Hoffman (name at top only)
author: Tao_Moko

posts.post_title: Fs: Ames miscut(next card showing) & Hoffman (name at top only)
posts.post_content:
Burns scrap - SGCA  *Rare reverse overprint on front and an outline in yw on back of possibly Hunter.  Not easy to find a freak like this for $[STRIKE]450[/STRIKE]$old

Ames miscut - SGC30 *shows top of next card on front. A similarly cut Joss sold at LoG in 2016 for $660.  I'm asking $[STRIKE]350[/STRIKE] $225

Hoffman name at top only - SGC10 $[STRIKE]125[/STRIKE]$90

Or, take both for $300 shipped UPS insured.

Email [url]esharpwork@gmail.com[/url] if interested
